code: export var timeConverter=function dhm(t){var cd=24*60*60*1000,ch=60*60*1000,d=Math.floor(t/cd),h=Math.floor((t-d*cd)/ch),m=Math.round((t-d*cd-h*ch)/60000),pad=function pad(n){return n<10?'0'+n:n;};if(m===60){h++;m=0;}if(h===24){d++;h=0;}return"".concat(d," days ").concat(pad(h)," hours and ").concat(pad(m)," minutes");};
